short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run your pomodoro, block pesky webs, and set your tab groups!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring:
- Pomodoro
- Web Blocker ( while working with pomodoro )
- Tab Group
- Startup page

This extension helps you manage your work better by making you focus on your work. this will notify you when it's time to break so, no need to feel guilty for checking your phone! 

You can also open tab groups & save them so that you can open multiple tabs at once based on what you're doing.

Finally, you can opt to run this extension on startup! It will ask you what're you going to do today based on your tab groups.

Feel free to suggest any improvement or critique on this extension page or send email to me at mariogunawan.work@gmail.com
